email.title: Macquarie Two-Day London Office Event - 6/7th August
email.text:
Didn't secure an internship this summer or looking to change roles? Start your internship search for next year with this two-day event in Macquarie's London offices!
Macquarie are looking for driven and talented students to join their 2019 Insight Programme on the 6th and 7th of August! Explore the company's career opportunities in Technology by taking part in skill-based workshops, case studies as well as a Hackathon.\ Accommodation and meals will be catered for.
[Click here to apply!](http://www.careers.macquarie.com/cw/en/job/941586/2019-macquarie-technology-insight-programme-emea)
**Applications close on July 23rd at 5 pm, so make sure to apply soon!**\ Note that this event is aimed at students on track for a 2:1 or equivalent who are in their: - first year of a 3 year course; - second year of a 4 year course; - penultimate of final year of their degree.
This opportunity is not open to PhD, MBA or experienced hire candidates.
You can find more details about the programme, requirements, and about Macquarie in the PDF attached.
